articles.title: Indiana Fever Guard Caitlin Clark Ruled Out for Remainder of 2025 Season - Indiana Fever
articles.description: Clark finishes the season after appearing in 13 games INDIANAPOLIS (Sept. 4, 2025) — Indiana Fever guard Caitlin Clark will miss the remainder of the 2025 WNBA season, the team announced today. Clark, a two-time All-Star and the 2024 WNBA Rookie of the Year, …
